entry.sentence: Just two months later , Rosemarie Magnus became Rittner 's wife .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (ADVP (NP (RB Just) (CD two) (NNS months)) (RB later)) (, ,) (NP (NNP Rosemarie) (NNP Magnus)) (VP (VBD became) (NP (NP (NNP Rittner) (POS 's)) (NN wife))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(months-3, Just-1) num(months-3, two-2) npadvmod(later-4, months-3) advmod(wife-11, later-4) nn(Magnus-7, Rosemarie-6) nsubj(wife-11, Magnus-7) cop(wife-11, became-8) poss(wife-11, Rittner-9) root(ROOT-0, wife-11)

entry.sentence: Among the wedding guests , in addition to Mr. and Mrs. von Schwarzburg , was also Mr. von Schlieben , who could not do enough to show his joy to the `` splendid little man '' .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN Among) (NP (DT the) (NN wedding) (NNS guests))) (, ,) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (NN addition)) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (NNP Mr.)) (CC and) (NP (NNP Mrs.) (NNP von) (NNP Schwarzburg)))))) (, ,) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB also)) (NP (NP (NNP Mr.) (NNP von) (NNP Schlieben)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (VP (MD could) (RB not) (VP (VB do) (ADJP (JJ enough) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB show) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN joy)) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (`` ``) (JJ splendid) (JJ little) (NN man) ('' ''))))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(guests-4, the-2) nn(guests-4, wedding-3) prep_among(Schlieben-19, guests-4) prep_in_addition_to(Schlieben-19, Mr.-9) nn(Schwarzburg-13, Mrs.-11) nn(Schwarzburg-13, von-12) conj_and(Mr.-9, Schwarzburg-13) prep_in_addition_to(Schlieben-19, Schwarzburg-13) cop(Schlieben-19, was-15) advmod(Schlieben-19, also-16) nn(Schlieben-19, Mr.-17) nn(Schlieben-19, von-18) root(ROOT-0, Schlieben-19) nsubj(enough-25, Schlieben-19) xsubj(show-27, Schlieben-19) aux(enough-25, could-22) neg(enough-25, not-23) dep(enough-25, do-24) rcmod(Schlieben-19, enough-25) aux(show-27, to-26) xcomp(enough-25, show-27) poss(joy-29, his-28) dobj(show-27, joy-29) det(man-35, the-31) amod(man-35, splendid-33) amod(man-35, little-34) prep_to(show-27, man-35)
